title: Taken Away
description: **New, extended edition!**  William MacDonald feels his life is missing something. With an arranged marriage soon approaching, and the knowledge that he's expected to someday take his father's place in society, he pushes forward, holding himself to the high standard of honor he always has. However, when a strange woman arrives on the clan lands, William's world is turned upside down. While everyone whispers the stranger is a witch, and a rival family threatens to destroy the peace everyone has become accustomed to, William finds himself contemplating one thing: what is more important--honor, or love?
author: Kamery Solomon
